target: Ok the TR9595 leaves at 20:40, do you want a booking?
context: <user>  I'm looking to book lodging for a place to stay, it should be a guesthouse and have free wifi. <system>  In what area would you prefer it to be? <user>  I would like one in Caimbridge that is in the cheap price range. <system>  I have 9 of them. If you don't have a certain area, I can recommend the el shaddai. <user>  The El Shaddi is fine. Can I please have a room for 4 people, for 4 nights, starting from Monday? <system>  Your rooms at the El Shaddai have been booked. Your reference number is JYUN4Q2R . Is there anything further I can assist you with today? <user>  Yes, please help me find a train? I need to travel on Friday, and I need to arrive at my destination by 21:15, please. <system>  What are your departure and destination cities?<user>  I am leaving from Cambridge and going to Stansted Airport. <system>  I have 16 trains to choose from. Do you have a price preference?<user>  No, but if you can't decide, maybe pick the one that departs the latest and still gets us their by 21:15. <system>
